ValidationRule.description: All the Value Metric Fields should be Filled
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.Name == 'GTO FSE VOC' && (ISPICKVAL( Value_Metric1__c ,'') || ISPICKVAL(Value_Metric2__c,'') || ISPICKVAL(Value_Metric3__c,'') || ISPICKVAL(Value_Metric4__c,''))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: All the Value Metric fields should be Filled
